title: SKBitmap - perhaps we need factory methods in addition to constructors
body: The Factory methods would return null when the bitmap can not be created,instead of raising an exception.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: I was going to add this, but then I decided that this is actually bad. If I am creating a bitmap, and it is not created, what does that mean? The only reason for a null bitmap is if there was a problem, which is an exception.
